channel.title: Animator / Motion Graphics Designer
channel.description: Hello everyone! We are looking to hire a talented animator to work with our art directors in creating explainer /intro videos to a voice over (we already have). remote work, flexible hours available. must be an experienced animator/motion graphics designer able to coordinate work in slack. Please email your CV and portfolio to aletha@bitbay.market
